accepted_if: Iyi ndima inofanira kugamuchirwa kana :other iri :value.
after: Iyi ndima inofanirwa kunge iri mushure me:date.
after_or_equal: Iyi ndima inofanira kunge iri zuva rinotevera kana kuenzana na:date.
alpha: Nzvimbo iyi inofanirwa kunge iine mavara chete.
alpha_dash: Iyi ndima inongofanirwa kunge iine mavara, manhamba, madheshi uye underscores.
alpha_num: Nzvimbo iyi inofanirwa kunge iine mavara nenhamba chete.
ascii: Iyi ndima inofanira chete kuva ne-single-byte alphanumeric characters nezviratidzo.
before: Iyi ndima inofanira kunge isati yasvika :date.
before_or_equal: Iyi ndima inofanirwa kunge iri zuva risati rasvika kana rakaenzana ne:date.
between.array: Munda uyu unofanirwa kunge uine zvinhu zviri pakati pe:min ne:max.
between.file: Iyi ndima inofanira kuva pakati pe:min ne:max kilobytes.
between.numeric: Iyi ndima inofanira kuva pakati pe:min ne:max.
between.string: Iyi ndima inofanira kuva pakati pe:min ne:max mavara.
boolean: Iyi ndima inofanira kuva yechokwadi kana yenhema.
date_equals: Iyi ndima inofanirwa kunge iri zuva rakaenzana ne:date.
decimal: Iyi ndima inofanira kuva ne:decimal nzvimbo dzedhesimali.
declined_if: Iyi ndima inofanira kurambwa kana :other iri :value.
digits: Iyi ndima inofanira kuva nenhamba dzinenge :digits.
digits_between: Iyi ndima inofanira kuva pakati pe:min ne:max manhamba.
doesnt_contain: Iyi shamba haifanirwe kunge iine chero yeinotevera: :values.
doesnt_end_with: Iyi ndima haifanirwe kupera neimwe yezvinotevera: :values.
doesnt_start_with: Iyi ndima haifanirwe kutanga neimwe yezvinotevera: :values.
email: Iyi ndima inofanira kunge iri kero yeemail inoshanda.
ends_with: Munda uyu unofanira kupera nechimwe chezvinotevera: :values.
extensions: Iyi ndima inofanirwa kuve neimwe yeanotevera ekuwedzera: :values.
file: Iyi ndima inofanira kunge iri faira.

gt.string: Iyi ndima inofanira kuva yakakura kudarika mavara :value.

gte.numeric: Iyi ndima inofanira kuva yakakura kudarika kana kuenzana ne:value.
gte.string: Iyi ndima inofanira kuva yakakura kudarika kana kuenzana nemavara :value.

in_array_keys: Iyi shamba inofanirwa kunge iine imwe yeiyo inotevera makiyi: :values.
ip: Iyi ndima inofanirwa kunge iri kero yeIP inoshanda.

list: Iyi ndima inofanira kunge iri rondedzero.
lowercase: Munda uyu unofanira kuva nemavara madiki (lowercase).

lt.file: Iyi ndima inofanira kunge iri pasi pe:value kilobytes.

lt.string: Iyi ndima inofanira kunge iri pasi pemavara :value.

lte.file: Iyi ndima inofanira kunge iri pasi kana kuenzana ne:value kilobytes.
lte.numeric: Iyi ndima inofanira kunge iri pasi kana kuenzana ne:value.
lte.string: Iyi ndima inofanira kunge iri pasi kana kuenzana nemavara :value.
mac_address: Nzvimbo iyi inofanira kunge iri kero yeMAC inoshanda.

mimes: Iyi ndima inofanira kunge iri faira remhando: :values.

missing_with: Iyi ndima inofanira kunge isipo kana :values iripo.
missing_with_all: Iyi ndima inofanira kunge isipo kana :values varipo.
multiple_of: Iyi ndima inofanira kuva yakawanda ye:value.
password.letters: Nzvimbo iyi inofanira kunge iine vara rimwechete.
password.mixed: Nzvimbo iyi inofanira kunge iine vara guru rimwe chete uye vadiki rimwe chete.
password.numbers: Iyi ndima inofanira kunge iine nhamba imwe chete.
password.symbols: Iyi ndima inofanira kunge iine chiratidzo chimwe chete.
password.uncompromised: Munda wakapihwa waonekwa mune data leak. Ndapota sarudza imwe nzvimbo.

present_unless: Iyi ndima inofanira kunge iripo kunze kwekunge :other ari :value.

present_with_all: Iyi ndima inofanira kuvapo kana :values varipo.
prohibited_unless: Iyi ndima inorambidzwa kunze kwekunge :other ari mu:values.
relatable: Iyi ndima inogona kunge isingabatanidzwe nechinhu ichi.
required_array_keys: Iyi ndima inofanirwa kunge ine zvinyorwa zve: :values.
required_unless: Iyi ndima inodiwa kunze kwekunge :other ari mu:values.
required_with_all: Iyi ndima inodiwa kana :values zvese zviripo.
required_without_all: Iyi ndima inodiwa kana pasina kana :values aripo.
size.array: Munda uyu unofanirwa kunge uine zvinhu :size.
starts_with: Munda uyu unofanira kutanga nechimwe chezvinotevera: :values.
timezone: Iyi ndima inofanira kuva yenguva yenguva.
